description: Visualize all MicroProfile Metrics for WildFly 16+

panels.description: Displays the "recent cpu usage" for the Java Virtual Machine process.
panels.title: Process CPU Load

panels.description: Displays the uptime of the Java virtual machine
panels.title: JVM Uptime

panels.description: Displays the number of processors available to the Java virtual machine. This value may change during a particular invocation of the virtual machine.
panels.title: Available Processors

panels.description: Number of currently deployed threads
panels.title: Current Thread count

panels.description: Displays the peak live thread count since the Java virtual machine started or peak was reset. This includes daemon and non-daemon threads.
panels.title: Peak Thread Count

panels.description: Displays the system load average for the last minute. The system load average is the sum of the number of runnable entities queued to the available processors and the number of runnable entities running on the available processors averaged over a period of time. The way in which the load average is calculated is operating system specific but is typically a damped time-dependent average. If the load average is not available, a negative value is displayed. This attribute is designed to provide a hint about the system load and may be queried frequently. The load average may be unavailable on some platform where it is expensive to implement this method.
panels.title: System Load Average

panels.description: Displays the number of classes that are currently loaded in the Java virtual machine.
panels.title: Current Loaded Class Count

panels.description: Displays the current number of live daemon threads.
panels.title: Daemon Thread Count

panels.description: Displays the amount of used memory and max memory.
panels.title: Heap Memory

panels.description: Displays the total number of collections that have occurred. This attribute lists -1 if the collection count is undefined for this collector.
panels.title: G1 Young Generation GC Count

panels.description: Displays the total number of collections that have occurred. This attribute lists -1 if the collection count is undefined for this collector.
panels.title: G1 Old Generation GC Count

panels.description: Displays the approximate accumulated collection elapsed time in milliseconds. This attribute displays -1 if the collection elapsed time is undefined for this collector. The Java virtual machine implementation may use a high resolution timer to measure the elapsed time. This attribute may display the same value even if the collection count has been incremented if the collection elapsed time is very short.
panels.title: G1 Young Generation GC Time

panels.description: Displays the approximate accumulated collection elapsed time in milliseconds. This attribute displays -1 if the collection elapsed time is undefined for this collector. The Java virtual machine implementation may use a high resolution timer to measure the elapsed time. This attribute may display the same value even if the collection count has been incremented if the collection elapsed time is very short.
panels.title: G1 Old Generation GC Time

panels.description: Displays the amount of used memory and max memory.
panels.title: Non Heap Memory

panels.description: Displays the total number of classes unloaded since the Java virtual machine has started execution.
panels.title: Total Unloaded Class Count

panels.description: Displays the total number of classes that have been loaded since the Java virtual machine has started execution.
panels.title: Total Loaded Class Count

panels.description: The memory used by the NIO pool: direct and mapped
panels.title: BufferPool used memory direct and mapped

panels.description: Max and current usage of the G1 Survivor Space memory pool
panels.title: memoryPool.G1 Survivor Space

panels.description: Max ans current usage of the G1 Old Gen memory pool
panels.title: memoryPool.G1 Old Gen

panels.description: Max and current usage  of the Compressed Class Space memory pool
panels.title: memoryPool.Compressed Class Space

panels.description: Max and current usage of the Metaspace memory pool
panels.title: memoryPool.Metaspace

panels.description: Max and current usage of the G1 Eden Space memory pool
panels.title: memoryPool.G1 Eden Space

panels.description: Max and current usage of the CodeHeap 'non-profiled nmethods' memory pool
panels.title: memoryPool.CodeHeap 'non-profiled nmethods'

panels.description: Max and current usage of the CodeHeap 'non-nmethods' memory pool
panels.title: memoryPool.CodeHeap 'non-nmethods'

panels.description: Max and current usage of the CodeHeap 'profiled nmethods' memory pool
panels.title: memoryPool.CodeHeap 'profiled nmethods'

panels.description: Returns the number of outgoing (send) connections
panels.title: wildfly_jgroups_num_send_connections

panels.title: wildfly_jgroups_resend_last_seqno_max_times

panels.title: wildfly_jgroups_number_of_credit_responses_received

panels.description: Returns the number of bytes of all messages in all retransmit buffers. To compute the size, Message.getLength() is used
panels.title: wildfly_jgroups_size_of_all_messages

panels.description: Largest number of threads in the thread pool
panels.title: wildfly_jgroups_thread_pool_size_largest

panels.description: The average time of transaction commit, measured from the moment the client calls commit until the transaction manager determines that the commit attempt was successful.
panels.title: wildfly_transactions_average_commit_time

panels.description: Current number of threads in the thread pool
panels.title: wildfly_jgroups_thread_pool_size

panels.description: Max time to block on reading of peer address
panels.title: wildfly_jgroups_peer_addr_read_timeout

panels.description: Number of timer tasks queued up for execution
panels.title: wildfly_jgroups_timer_tasks

panels.description: Returns the number of bytes of all messages in all retransmit buffers. To compute the size, Message.size() is used
panels.title: wildfly_jgroups_size_of_all_messages_incl_headers

panels.description: Receiver buffer size in bytes
panels.title: wildfly_jgroups_recv_buf_size

panels.description: Number of threads currently in the pool
panels.title: wildfly_jgroups_timer_threads

panels.description: Number of active sessions
panels.title: wildfly_undertow_active_sessions

panels.description: The number of transactions that have begun but not yet terminated.
panels.title: wildfly_transactions_number_of_inflight_transactions

panels.description: The number of requests that are currently running in the server
panels.title: wildfly_request_controller_active_requests

panels.description: Total sessions created
panels.title: wildfly_undertow_sessions_created

panels.description: The maximum number of sessions that have been active simultaneously
panels.title: wildfly_undertow_highest_session_count

panels.description: Average time that expired sessions had been alive
panels.title: wildfly_undertow_session_avg_alive_time

panels.description: The longest time that an expired session had been alive
panels.title: wildfly_undertow_session_max_alive_time

panels.description: The number of aborted (i.e. rolledback) transactions.
panels.title: wildfly_transactions_number_of_aborted_transactions

panels.description: The total number of nested (sub) transactions created.
panels.title: wildfly_transactions_number_of_nested_transactions

panels.description: Number of rejected sessions
panels.title: wildfly_undertow_rejected_sessions

panels.description: Number of sessions that have expired
panels.title: wildfly_undertow_expired_sessions

panels.description: The number of transactions that have rolled back due to timeout.
panels.title: wildfly_transactions_number_of_timed_out_transactions

panels.description: The number of transactions that have been rolled back by application request. This includes those that timeout, since the timeout behavior is considered an attribute of the application configuration.
panels.title: wildfly_transactions_number_of_application_rollbacks

panels.description: The number of transactions which have terminated with heuristic outcomes.
panels.title: wildfly_transactions_number_of_heuristics

panels.description: The maximum allowed number of concurrent sessions that this session manager supports
panels.title: wildfly_undertow_max_active_sessions

panels.description: The number of bytes that have been sent out on this listener
panels.title: wildfly_undertow_bytes_sent

panels.description: The total number of transactions (top-level and nested) created
panels.title: wildfly_transactions_number_of_transactions

panels.description: The number of transactions that rolled back due to resource (participant) failure.
panels.title: wildfly_transactions_number_of_resource_rollbacks

panels.description: The number of transactions that have been rolled back due to internal system errors.
panels.title: wildfly_transactions_number_of_system_rollbacks

panels.description: The total processing time of all requests handed by this listener
panels.title: wildfly_undertow_processing_time

panels.description: The number of 500 responses that have been sent by this listener
panels.title: wildfly_undertow_error_count

panels.description: The number of committed transactions.
panels.title: wildfly_transactions_number_of_committed_transactions

panels.description: The number of bytes that have been received by this listener
panels.title: wildfly_undertow_bytes_received

panels.description: Maximal time for processing request
panels.title: wildfly_undertow_max_request_time

panels.description: The maximum processing time taken by a request on this listener
panels.title: wildfly_undertow_max_processing_time

panels.description: Minimal time for processing request
panels.title: wildfly_undertow_min_request_time

panels.description: Number of all requests
panels.title: wildfly_undertow_request_count

panels.description: Total time spend in processing all requests
panels.title: wildfly_undertow_total_request_time

title: MicroProfile WildFly 16 Metrics
